body_html:
@skye I've updated the PR. Summary:
-- I've addressed all but one comment (python code formatting)
-- @galv will help making changes on how we resolve nesting in records, indexing in arrays, key-access in maps. In brief, we'll make the following syntax changes
/ -> .
/[ -> [
[' -> [
'] -> ]
to be consistent with spark avro, databricks avro interfaces.
-- we'll also add namespace support as follows

  • warn if no namespace is provided and use top-level namespace
  • fail for wrong namespace

to be consistent with spark avro, databricks avro interfaces.
-- we'll also add namespace support as follows

warn if no namespace is provided and use top-level namespace
fail for wrong namespace
body:
@skye I've updated the PR. Summary:
-- I've addressed all but one comment (python code formatting)
-- @galv will help making changes on how we resolve nesting in records, indexing in arrays, key-access in maps. In brief, we'll make the following syntax changes
/ -> .
/[ -> [
[' -> [
'] -> ]
to be consistent with spark avro, databricks avro interfaces.
-- we'll also add namespace support as follows
* warn if no namespace is provided and use top-level namespace
* fail for wrong namespace
